plot outline: Jinki Re Jinki ! You've got to Win! This is a story about relationship between a 7 year old child who is a brat, who has been thrown out of the school previously & the new teacher the villagers have got. It is about how the new teacher converts this brat into a good student who wants to attend the school & learn to be successful in life.
title: Jinki Re Jinki
